#labels about-dom,is-dom-event,from-microsoft
== summary ==
The onbeforeunload event fires before a document is unloaded (e.g. when you close a browser window or tab).

== Usage ==

== Event targets ==

The `onbeforeunload` event fires on these objects:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [WindowObject window]

== Issues ==

In Internet Explorer, clicking on a link that has a javascript URL will trigger this event.

{{{
<script>
window.onbeforeunload = function() {
  alert('beforeunload');
};
</script>

<a href="javascript:void 0">Click to trigger beforeunload event</a>
}}}

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
